text:
Unfortunately Apache's Bugzilla is not a support system, nor is the bugzilla
software anything to do with us.
I suggest that you should submit this to mozilla's bugzilla -
http://bugzilla.mozilla.org/ in the "bugzilla" product.

The problem is not with bugzilla per se.

Would like to know why apache is not able to load mysql.so
If you can point me to a resource for integrating MySQL with apache it will be 
really helpful

thanks
